about_the_game:
Hentai Dice Sudoku offers a unique Dice Sudoku experience across 900 levels! Challenge your mind with puzzles that get progressively harder as you roll the dice faces to solve each sudoku. For every puzzle solved, you'll be rewarded with a special hentai image generated by AI and curated by human intelligence. Players can revisit any unlocked hentai images at any time, providing a gallery of your earned rewards. For moments when you need discretion, a panic button allows for a swift switch between Dice Sudoku and Hentai Dice Sudoku modes!

Features
  • 900 levels with increasing difficulty.
  • 900 AI-generated, human-approved hentai images.
  • Quick switch between Dice Sudoku and Hentai Dice Sudoku modes with a panic button.
  • Unique Dice Sudoku mechanics adding an exciting twist to classic sudoku.

Sudoku Rules
  • Each region must contain the numbers 1 to 9.
  • Each row must contain the numbers 1 to 9.
  • Each column must contain the numbers 1 to 9.

How to Play
  • Click on an empty cell.
  • Type the correct number using your keyboard.

Key Assignments
  • Gameplay
    • Selection: Mouse Button 0
    • Input: Alpha | Joystick Button | Keypad
    • Erase: Alpha 0 | Backspace | Clear | Delete | Joystick Button 0 | Keypad 0
  • User Interface
    • Panic Button: Escape | P | X
    • Panic Combo: Alt & F4
    • Left Button: A | Down Arrow | Home | Left Arrow | Page Down | Q | S | Wheel Down
    • Right Button: D | E | End | Page Up | Right Arrow | Up Arrow | W | Wheel Up

Purchase Hentai Dice Sudoku now, challenge your sudoku skills, and collect hentai rewards at every level!

content_descriptors.notes: Our game, "Hentai Dice Sudoku," contains adult content primarily focused on sexual themes and explicit nudity. As players solve Dice Sudoku puzzles, they unlock hentai-style artwork that features detailed and provocative imagery. The game does not include scenes of violence, non-consensual sexual acts, drug use, alcohol abuse, or self-harm. The explicit content is purely visual and intended for mature audiences who appreciate erotic art. Players should be aware that the game includes highly detailed and explicit sexual imagery.

name: Hentai Dice Sudoku

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10 version 21H1 (build 19043) or newer
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support, ARM64
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 or Vulkan capable GPUs
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Hardware vendor officially supported drivers
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Hentai Dice Sudoku is a 900-level puzzle game. Play sudoku using dice faces, and for every level you complete, you’ll be rewarded with AI-generated hentai images. Improve your sudoku skills and enjoy a truly unique experience!
